Home           //        Instruction & Research                 //         Digital Studio                                            The Digital Studio                     search the site                                                                                             Digital Studio website     Open Monday-Friday, 10am-6pm     Bobst Library, 5th Floor,     South Wing     1-212-992-9233      digital.studio@nyu.edu              Information about the services available through the Digital Studio, a collaborative effort of ITS and the NYU Libraries, is now located on the NYU Libraries website: nyu.libguides.com/digitalstudio .     The Digital Studio supports digital scholarship, research, and teaching and provides consultation, training, and tools for:    Multimedia capture, production, and publication (audio, video, images, various editing and delivery tools and platforms)  File storage and management  Digital scholarship, digital project planning, and management   Copyright and fair use (including creative commons licensing, open access, and author's rights)  Digital publishing (Faculty Digital Archive, journal publishing, and other options)  Teaching and learning projects and learning management tools  Digital archiving    For more information, visit nyu.libguides.com/digitalstudio .

Friday, March 20: Open 10am - 5pm ET   Monday, March 23 ET: Normal hours resume         General Information     The Advanced Media Studio (AMS) is a state-of-the-art facility and technology resource for the NYU community. The AMS provides professional services in museum-grade wide-format archival digital printmaking, laser cutting and etching, rapid prototyping/3D printing, 3D scanning and project development consultation. The AMS features a suite of self-service workstations offering special discipline hardware and software, supporting content building for the AMS professional services.    Access to the Advanced Media Studio is granted to the entire NYU community. To request a consultation, or to schedule a visit, please see the contact information to the right. All AMS Services are offered at an internal charge rate for those within or affiliated with the NYU community. Please refer to the AMS Price List for price examples and payment terms.    Page last reviewed: March 11, 2015

Digital Studio - NYU Libraries                               This is the "Digital Studio" guide.      Alternate Page for Screenreader Users      Skip to Page Content                                             Digital Studio Supporting Teaching, Learning and Research        Last update: Apr 28, 2015        URL: http://guides.nyu.edu/content_mobile.php?pid=264542                                                                          Home                                                                                  General Information                 Location 5th Floor South Research Commons Bobst Library 70 Washington Square South Hours Mondays: 10am - 6pm Tuesdays: 10am - 6pm Wednesdays: 10am - 8pm Thursdays: 10am - 6pm Fridays: 10am - 6pm Bobst Library Hours & Access Make an appointment    Contact Phone: (212) 992-9233 Email: digital.studio@nyu.edu     The Digital Studio is available to NYU faculty, students, and staff only. A NYU NetID is required for access.                                               Welcome                 #TorchTechChat features NYU's Web Publishing Wordpress service              Comments (0)                                              close                                                                                                          Media Production Services                                                                                  Digital Studio Specs                    The Digital Studio has19 iMacs running Mac OSX, including:     7 video editing   2 flatbed scanning   2 film scanning   2 document scanning   1 audio editing   5 general use     Reserve a station                                             Analog to Digital                 Transfer a variety of non-digital media to digital files that can be stored and shared.     Video VHS tape and DVD (NTSC and PAL), VHS-C tape (mini VHS), LaserDisc, Hi8 and 8mm tape, DV and HDDV tape   Audio Compact Casette (casette tape), Digital Audio Tape (DAT), LP (vinyl records), CD (compact disc)   Make an appointment to transfer media                                             Physical to Digital                   Scan up to 12" x 18" documents on our flatbed at up to 2,400 ppi with OCR (searchable text).   Scan 35mm negatives and postivies (e.g. Kodachrome slides) at up to 4,000 ppi optimized to color-correct by film brand and type.   Scanners     Epson Expression 11000XL & 10000XL graphics arts scanners   Epson Workforce GT-S80 feeder scanner   Nikon CoolScan 5000 ED slide film scanner     Make an appointment for scanning           Comments (0)                                         Post Production                 Don't see your preferred editing suite on our list? Please contact us with software recommendations.   Video   Final Cut Pro 7 and X, Avid Media Composer, Adobe Premiere Pro CC, iMovie HD and 10, Quicktime Pro   Audio   Pro Tools 10, Logic Pro 9, Audacity, Garage Band, Quicktime Pro, Soundflower   Make an appointment for post production                                             Hours and Contact                         Location : 5th Floor South Research Commons Bobst Library 70 Washington Square South       Hours : Monday-Tuesday, 10am-6pm Wednesday, 10am-8pm Thursday-Friday, 10am-6pm Bobst Library Hours & Access       Contact : Phone: (212) 992-9233 Email: digital.studio@nyu.edu Make an appointment   The Digital Studio is available to NYU faculty, students, and staff. A NYU NetID is required for access.                     Comments (0)                                              close                                                                                                          Consultation Services                                                                                  Teaching and Learning                 About   The Digital Studio offers one-on-one and small group consultations for scholars who would like advice and recommendations on 'best practices' for their projects or academic programs. Our eLearning specialists and instructional technologists specialize in the services and tools below:     Google Apps for Education   NYU Classes   NYU Stream   NYU Wikis   Instructional Video Modules   Web Publishing     Training and Workshops   You may make an appointment at the Digital Studio for a consultation.   View this website on more information around trainings and workshops.                                              Digital Scholarship                 Help for scholars using technology for their research. Advice on:     Project scoping, planning, and management   Workflow design   Best practices for digitization and metadata   Copyright and Fair Use (including creative commons licensing, open access, and author's rights)   Digital publishing ( Faculty Digital Archive , journal publishing, and other options)   File management and storage     Make an appointment for Digital Scholarship help To learn more, visit the library's Digital Scholarship Services page.                                             Hours and Contact                         Location : 5th Floor South Research Commons Bobst Library 70 Washington Square South       Hours : Monday-Tuesday, 10am-6pm Wednesday, 10am-8pm Thursday-Friday, 10am-6pm Bobst Library Hours & Access       Contact : Phone: (212) 992-9233 Email: digital.studio@nyu.edu Make an appointment    The Digital Studio is available to NYU faculty, students, and staff. A NYU NetID is required for access.
